channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: We Can Give No Clemency To The Assassination Left
item.description: Playing around the people who inspire violence is not an option. Right now, to hold the country together, their movement can receive no quarter.

item.title: Want To Honor Charlie Kirk’s Legacy? Emulate His Moral Courage
item.description: Honor Charlie's legacy by asking yourself each day, 'How can I demonstrate the type of moral courage that he displayed to the very end?'

item.title: After Charlie Kirk’s Assassination, Sitting On The Sidelines Isn’t An Option

item.title: Drugmakers Have a Right to Advertise
item.description: The First Amendment applies to commercial speech as well as political speech.

item.title: America in Real Life Must Not Be as Rabid as America Online
item.description: If we honor Charlie Kirk’s legacy of good-faith engagement, we will reflexively step back from the precipice.

item.title: Supreme Court Justice Kavanaugh says no one person should have too much power
item.description: Supreme Court Justice Brett M. Kavanaugh is defending the separation of powers, saying no one person should have too much power in the United States.

item.title: The Silver Lining for Trump in His Trade Policy Setbacks
item.description: Failing to achieve his desired tariff levels could inspire him to build a trade system that serves America and the free world — at China’s expense.

item.title: AI Will Destroy Entire Industries, and That’s a Good Thing
item.description: After each wave of innovation, our country has emerged more prosperous and economically capable. This time will be no different.

item.title: An Upside-Down Case That Originalism Killed Constitutional Amendments
item.description: Jill Lepore refutes her own argument against originalism.
